_source.text: A division of toy icon Mattel, Fisher Price knows battery operated ride on toys better than anyone else having manufactured the Power Wheels line of electric ride on trucks and cars for over 30 years.

text: A division of toy icon Mattel, Fisher Price knows battery operated **ride** **on** toys **better** **than** anyone
else having manufactured the Power **Wheels** **line** of electric **ride** **on** trucks and cars for over 30 years.
